name: Shoutmon
effect: [On Play] Reveal 5 cards from the top of your deck. Add 1 Digimon card with [Shoutmon] in its name and 1 Digimon card with ＜Blitz＞ among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has ＜Blitz＞, it gets +2000 DP.
